title: Episode 15: It’s Not Fair! Equity in Life and Work
description:
The battle cry of childhood - It’s not fair - tends to follow us throughout life. Let’s take a look at how fairness, or the lack therof, plays itself out in the work place. Get ready for a little...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com

itunes:subtitle: Ah, fairness. We all want it. Children cry for it. Let's find out how it affects us at work.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
